    17: const META_ID = '__meta-data__';
    18:
    19: /** Return callback names for passing to JavaScript
    20: * @return Array $callbacks
    21: */
    22: function Callbacks() {
    23: $c = Env\Info();
    24: return $c->settings->callback;
    25: }
    26:
    27: /** Using Env\Param('modifier') or provided param from data response to determine response content-type
    28: * @param String $modifier
    29: * @return String $content_type
    30: */
    31: function ContentType(String $modifier=NULL) {
    32: $default = 'txt';
    33:
    34: $options = Env\Model\Http\MediaTypes();
    35:
    36: $mod = ($modifier)
    37: ? $modifier
    38: : ((Env\Param('modifier'))
    39: ? Env\Param('modifier')
    40: : $default);
    41:
    42: return (in_array($mod, array_keys($options)))
    43: ? $options[$mod]
    44: : $options[$default];
    45: }
    46:
    47: /** Load callback generated data
    48: * @return Array $callback_data
    49: */
    50: function Data() {
    51: $callbacks = Callbacks();
    52:
    53: if (is_null($callbacks) || (! is_array($callbacks))) {
    54: return [];
    55: }
    56:
    57: $pos_ns = Resource\Related\possible_paths();
    58:
    59: $rep = (object) [];
    60: foreach ($callbacks AS $call) {
    61: $rep->$call = false;
    62: }
    63: $rep = (object)
    64: array_combine(
    65: array_keys((array)$rep),
    66: array_map(
    67: function ($k, $v) use ($pos_ns) {
    68: return Resource\is_available_function($k, $v, $pos_ns);
    69: },
    70: array_keys((array)$rep),
    71: array_values((array)$rep)
    72: ));
    73:
    74: foreach (array_keys((array)$rep) AS $k) {
    75: if (! $rep->$k) {
    76: unset($rep->$k);
    77: }
    78: }
    79:
    80: $available = (array) $rep;
    81:
    82: $res = array_map(
    83: function ($c) {
    84: return $c();
    85: },
    86: $available
    87: );
    88:
    89: $res[META_ID] = (object)[];
    90:
    91: foreach ($res AS $i) {
    92: if (is_object($i) && property_exists($i, 'title')) {
    93: $res[META_ID]->title = $i->title;
    94: }
    95: }
    96: return $res;
    97: }
    98:
    99: /** Include files for Model (ie. css, javascript)
    100: * @return Object $includes [ lib, css, js ]
    101: */
    102: function Includes() {
    103: $def = Resource\Def();
    104:
    105: return ($def && property_exists($def, 'config'))
    106: ? $def->config->Include
    107: : (object) [];
    108: }
    109:
    110: /** Return meta-data attribute value from Model\Data()
    111: * @param Object $obj Model\Data()
    112: * @param String $attribute
    113: * @return Mixed false|$value
    114: */
    115: function MetaData(Object $obj, String $param) {
    116: return (property_exists($obj, $param))
    117: ? $obj[META_ID]->$param
    118: : false;
    119: }
    120:
    121: /** Request method
    122: * @return String $method [ GET, POST, PUT, DEL ]
    123: */
    124: function Method() {
    125: return Env\Param('method');
    126: }
    127:
    128: /** Model related paths and relative urls
    129: * @param String $str Path parameter key
    130: * @return Mixed false|$value
    131: */
    132: function Paths(String $str=NULL) {
    133: $def = (object) [
    134: 'app_directory' => Env\Path('root'),
    135: 'app_url' => Env\Param('offset'),
    136: 'app_query_delim' => Env\Param('query_delim'),
    137: 'modifier' => Env\Param('modifier'),
    138: 'resource' => Env\Param('resource'),
    139: 'resource_url' => Resource\Addon\Url(),
    140: 'route' => Env\Param('route'),
    141: 'url' => Env\Param('url'),
    142: 'uuid' => Env\uuid(),
    143: 'addon_directory' => Resource\Addon\Path()
    144: ];
    145:
    146: return ($str && property_exists($def, $str))
    147: ? $def->$str
    148: : false;
    149: }
    150:
    151: /** Response code; using internal evaluation.
    152: * @param Int $code
    153: * @return Object $obj Containing $obj->code, $obj->message
    154: */
    155: function ResponseCode(Int $code=200) {
    156: $options = (object) [
    157: 200 => 'OK', // route exists
    158: 201 => 'Created', // API create
    159: 202 => 'Accepted', // API accepted
    160: 204 => 'No Content', // Response no content
    161: 206 => 'Partial Content', // Response partial content
    162: 303 => 'See Other',
    163: 304 => 'Not Modified', // API not modified
    164: 305 => 'Use Proxy', // Use Proxy; login
    165: 400 => 'Bad Request',
    166: 401 => 'Unauthorized',
    167: 403 => 'Forbidden',
    168: 404 => 'Not Found',
    169: 405 => 'Method Not Allowed',
    170: 407 => 'Proxy Authentication Required',
    171: 501 => 'Not Implemented'
    172: ];
    173:
    174: http_response_code($code);
    175: return (object) [
    176: 'code' => http_response_code(),
    177: 'message' => (property_exists($options, $code))
    178: ? $options->$code
    179: : false
    180: ];
    181: }
